trans-unit.source: Draws a glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 在活动设计器上的 Z 顺序的最顶层位置绘制标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> class is the base class for all designer glyphs used on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> 类是在工作流设计图面上使用的所有设计器标志符号的基类。

trans-unit.source: Activity designer developers can use classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> to draw custom glyphs onto the surface of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 活动设计器开发人员可以使用从 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> 继承的类在 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> 的图面上绘制自定义标志符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> classes draw such glyphs at the top-level Z order, which places the custom glyph visually on top of all other glyphs on the designer based on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> value of the custom glyph.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> 类在 Z 顺序的顶层绘制此类标志符号，这会根据自定义标志符号的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> 值将自定义标志符号直观地置于设计器上的所有其他标志符号之上。

trans-unit.source: A lower value for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> property indicates a higher priority and therefore draws the glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> 属性的值越小，表示优先级越高，因此会在活动设计器的 Z 顺序的最顶层位置绘制标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a glyph class that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个从 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph> 类派生的标志符号类。

trans-unit.source: The code overrides the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.GetBounds%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 该代码重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.GetBounds%2A> 和 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例中的 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Boolean,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner)" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> 继承时，必须重写以下成员：<see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Boolean,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner)" />。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中实现时，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> can gain focus on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> with which it is associated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> 能否在关联的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> 上获取焦点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer glyph can be activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以激活设计器标志符号，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates an implementation of the CanBeActivated property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了 CanBeActivated 属性的实现。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自“跟踪配置文件设计器”SDK 示例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[跟踪配置文件设计器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> with which the glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: 与标志符号关联的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 则指示在活动设计器图面上显示标志符号；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the glyph on the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> 上的标志符号的边界。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: 表示标志符号边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.GetBounds%2A> returns the bounds of the activity designer with which the glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: 除非在派生类中重写，否则 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.GetBounds%2A> 将返回与标志符号关联的活动设计器的边界。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.GetBounds%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.GetBounds%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The code sets the size and location of the custom glyph object.
trans-unit.target: 该代码设置自定义标志符号对象的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例中的 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="designer" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="designer" /> 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Represents the highest priority possible for a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> 的可能的最高优先级。

trans-unit.source: This value is a constant.
trans-unit.target: 该值是一个常数。

trans-unit.source: A lower value for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> property indicates a higher priority and therefore draws the glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> 属性的值越小，表示优先级越高，因此会在活动设计器的 Z 顺序的最顶层位置绘制标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.HighestPriority> field is 0.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.HighestPriority>字段为 0。

trans-unit.source: This constant value serves as a guideline when creating custom glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 此常数值用作创建自定义标志符号时的一个准则。

trans-unit.source: You are free to use different values for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> property when designing your custom glyph.
trans-unit.target: 设计自定义标志符号时，可以对 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> 属性随意使用不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the lowest priority possible for a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> 的可能的最低优先级。

trans-unit.source: This value is a constant.
trans-unit.target: 该值是一个常数。

trans-unit.source: A high value for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> property indicates a lower priority and therefore draws the glyph at the bottom-most Z order position on an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> 属性的值越大，表示优先级越低，因此会在活动设计器的 Z 顺序的最底层位置绘制标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.LowestPriority> field is 1000000.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.LowestPriority>字段为 1000000。

trans-unit.source: This constant value serves as a guideline when creating custom glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 此常数值用作创建自定义标志符号时的一个准则。

trans-unit.source: You are free to use different values for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> property when designing your custom glyph.
trans-unit.target: 设计自定义标志符号时，可以对 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> 属性随意使用不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the normal priority for a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> 的正常优先级。

trans-unit.source: This value is a constant.
trans-unit.target: 该值是一个常数。

trans-unit.source: A lower value for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> property indicates a higher priority whereas a higher value indicates a lower priority.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> 属性的值越小，表示优先级越高；而该值越大，表示优先级越低。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.NormalPriority> field is 10000.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.NormalPriority> 字段的值为 10000。

trans-unit.source: This constant value serves as a guideline when creating custom glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 此常数值用作创建自定义标志符号时的一个准则。

trans-unit.source: You are free to use different values for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> property when designing your custom glyph.
trans-unit.target: 设计自定义标志符号时，可以对 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.Priority%2A> 属性随意使用不同的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> on which the glyph is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 在其中绘制标志符号的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates to the glyph that an action has been performed which has activated the glyph.
trans-unit.target: 向标志符号指示激活它的操作已执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates an implementation of the OnActivate method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 OnActivate 方法的实现。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自“跟踪配置文件设计器”SDK 示例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[跟踪配置文件设计器示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: 用于执行填充和绘制任务的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" /> 则指示在设计图面上显示标志符号；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> to use to access ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: 要用于访问环境属性设置的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: 从中获取有关用户操作的信息的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，执行在活动设计器图面上呈现标志符号所需的任何任务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A> uses <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorPen%2A> to draw the bounds of the comment glyph and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorBrush%2A> to fill it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A> 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorPen%2A> 来绘制注释标志符号的边界并使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.CommentIndicatorBrush%2A> 进行填充。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how you can override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The code customizes how to draw the glyph object on the activity designer with which the glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: 该代码自定义在与标志符号关联的活动设计器上绘制标志符号对象的方式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例中的 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[工作流监视器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4f70c1c5-f82d-4d5f-8b7d-943b9f99f8e2)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority setting for the designer glyph on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: 获取活动设计图面上的设计器标志符号的优先级设置。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the priority setting for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值，表示活动设计器图面上 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph" /> 的优先级设置。

trans-unit.source: A lower value indicates a higher priority and therefore draws the glyph at the top-most Z order position on an activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 该值越小，表示优先级越高，因此会在活动设计器的 Z 顺序的最顶层位置绘制标志符号。
